Text: Moderator, I have a problem. Please help me taking this providences plagiarist! Thanks, YahSoft.

@YahSoft

"Moderator, I have a problem."

Yes, you do--you're a dumbass.  Unfortunately we can't help you with that.

You think you own the copyright on a torrent?  You think the Pirate Bay is going to protect your copyright?  Gimme a break.

I'm only replying here, rather than simply ignoring you, because the user in question happens to have been banned for an unrelated reason and I do not want you or anyone thinking it was because of your stupid comment. 

Spam moderators torrents with bullshit accusations again and you will be the one getting banned.
